page.title: 09Birthplace Mickletons People
page.content: These details were given by 37 famil- ies of children in Mickleton School. The first no. shows where the{Heads of {Family}were born;the second no.{Others {in Families.}**Mickleton3,4:Stratford- on-Avon1,8:Tiddington2,15:Moreton-in- Marsh8,7,:Shipston-on-Stour4,4:Evesham 1,5:Leamington1,8:Warwick1,2:Birmingha m2,5:Cheltenham0,9:Worcester1,3:Weston -on-Avon,Berkshire,Bridgend,Llandrinio Stonehouse,Welford-on-Avon,Cornwall, Hereford,Hidcote,Elgin,Coventry, Axminster,{all}1,0:Gloucester1,1: Middlesbrough,Tonbridge,Chester{all} 0,2:Wellesborne,Willersey,Bournemouth Shrewsbury,West Bromwich,Clifford Chambers,Banbury,Pattingham,Oxford, Invercargill NZ,Cape Town,London, Saintbury,Longborough,Wimpstone, Hidcote Bartrim,Badsey{all}0,1. Towns 2 to 5 have local maternity facilities.
